titles: Votes of Parliament touching the book commonly called The Racovian catechism.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,
notes: Order to print dated: Friday the Second of April, 1652. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
